source.title: How does SimSiam avoid collapse without negative samples? A unified understanding with self-supervised contrastive learning

confidence_rationale: Provides mechanistic analysis of asymmetry and optimization guardrails that supports bounded hybridization around MECH-058 rather than unconditional EMA-only claims.

mapping.source_claim_statement: Asymmetry and optimization dynamics jointly prevent collapse; multiple stabilizing mechanisms can substitute under specific conditions.
mapping.ree_translation: Supports MECH-058 hybridization: keep timescale separation core while adding explicit stress-regime guardrails and robustness criteria.
mapping.mapping_caveat: Theory/ablation evidence remains in SSL settings and does not directly provide biological pathway constraints.
mapping.source_context: Theoretical and empirical analysis of siamese SSL collapse behavior.

confidence_components.notes: Useful for narrowing claim scope and defining guardrails.
